parameters.operation: Scrape A Url And Get Its Content
Scrape A Url And Get Its Content

parameters.prompt:
Create a premium glass/acrylic medal or medallion featuring a majestic lion head. The medal should have:

Thick transparent glass or acrylic circular base (like a coin or medal)
The lion head engraved or embedded within the glass with holographic blue/purple lighting
Beveled edges around the circular medal perimeter
Crystal-clear glass material with internal neon lighting effects
The lion design glowing from within the glass structure
Realistic glass reflections and refractions
Medal should look like a premium award or trophy component
Depth and dimension showing the glass thickness
Polished, professional finish
The lion should appear to be laser-etched or holographically embedded inside the glass
Soft ambient lighting highlighting the glass edges
Background should be dark to emphasize the glass clarity and internal glow
Medal diameter should look substantial and premium
Include subtle surface reflections typical of polished glass

Style: Photorealistic 3D render, premium glass craftsmanship, award medal design, luxury materials, professional lighting
